Menagerie:Necropotence.NAME: Necropotence
Menagerie:Necropotence.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Draw !M! card. NL Lose 1 HP. NL Return this card to your hand.
Menagerie:Necropotence.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Lose 1 HP. NL Return this card to your hand.

Menagerie:PurgingElixir.NAME: Purging Elixir
Menagerie:PurgingElixir.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Remove all constricted, negative Strength, and negative Dexterity. NL Lose !M! HP.

Menagerie:Dismember.NAME: Dismember
Menagerie:Dismember.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses !M! Strength this turn and loses !M! HP. NL Exhaust.

Menagerie:Languish.NAME: Dismember
Menagerie:Languish.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength this turn and lose !M! HP. NL Exhaust.

Menagerie:Slaughter.NAME: Slaughter
Menagerie:Slaughter.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Exhaust a random card in your hand.
Menagerie:Slaughter.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Exhaust a card in your hand.

Menagerie:SagesJudgement.NAME: Sage's Judgement
Menagerie:SagesJudgement.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage to ALL enemies equal to half the number of cards in your deck. NL Exhaust.
Menagerie:SagesJudgement.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage to ALL enemies equal to two-thirds the number of cards in your deck. NL Exhaust.
